list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the ability of a customer to obtain goods or services before payment, based on the trust that payment will be made in the future.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã có tín dụng không giới hạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an entry recording a sum received, listed on the right-hand side or column of an account.
public acknowledgment or praise, typically that given or received when a person's responsibility for an action or idea becomes or is made apparent.
the quality of being believed or credited.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the abstract philosophy of Cicero has lost its credit
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Triết lý trừu tượng của Cicero đã mất tín dụng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: publicly acknowledge someone as a participant in the production of (something published or broadcast).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the screenplay is credited to one American and two Japanese writers
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trình chiếu được ghi có vào một người Mỹ và hai nhà văn Nhật Bản

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: add (an amount of money) to an account.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: this deferred tax can be credited to the profit and loss account
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thuế hoãn lại này có thể được ghi có vào tài khoản lãi và lỗ
